name: Push Comes to Shove
summary: Push Comes to Shove is an animated short about two men looking the same doing various bizarre things to their faces. Like one pulling the other's ears forward, tying them in front of his face, getting a big rock in between the tied ears and pulling said ears with rock toward the face making a big fluffy hole on it. Or using grass seed with water on other's face, growing grass on it, and using a lawnmower to mow it down! Or painting red marks on it so it looks like a baseball before hitting it, then another face appears literally from the neck up! Like I said, pretty bizarre and highly recommend! I saw this on Volume 5 of The International Tournee of Animation from 1992. Well worth seeing if you like the offbeat.
